ingredients.item: 500g pack frozen Cooksâ€™ Ingredients Soffritto Mix

instructions.step: Heat the olive oil in a large saucepan, add the soffritto and fry for 5 minutes until defrosted and softened slightly.

Rinse the pearl barley in a sieve under cold running water and add to the pan. Pour in the hot stock, cover with a lid, bring to the boil and then simmer gently for 45 minutes or until the pearl barley is tender.
Add the tomatoes to the pan with the cavolo nero. Simmer for 5 minutes or until the cavolo nero is tender. Check the seasoning, then divide among 4 bowls and serve.
